name: Password Derivative Extension
description: Protect your passwords by ensuring none of them are the same. This addon helps to convert your password to domain-based unique derivative, using non-reversible hash encryption: HTML_SAFE_BASE64(HMAC512(password, domain)). Usage: Right click in a password field and choose 'Encrypt password', or press Ctrl+Space (Command+Space on a Mac).

toggle-feature.description: Send a 'toggle-feature' event to the extension
